html:
4.10.17  1:53 am   will the video be out by easter which is on April 16. So will it be out before then?

     that would be nice

4.10.17  1:24 am   If you were a type/flavor of soup what type/flavor would you be?

     i guess i won't know until i'm soup
4.10.17  1:10 am   r u alive plis

4.10.17  12:58 am   Regarding the mix: it would be very weird to me if you didn't mix the whole thing as you were working and adding sound elements such as narration and the score, so I suspect it is about final touches and a little mastering (not to take away from that). Am I wrong?

     yes

4.10.17  12:10 am   Are you excited that people are getting excited for the new video?

     yes

4.10.17  12:04 am   What exactly is the mixing process?

     making sure all the parts are the right volume, relative to each other

4.10.17  12:02 am   Can you write music that represents a feeling/mood other than just happy or sad (like angry, nervous, impatient, etc.) without relying on lyrics?

     actually the feelings usually rely on the music. and the words and characters are there to take all the credit
4.9.17  11:43 pm   when will u start making videos again?
4.9.17  11:32 pm   Is there any chance to get I'm crazy/it's raining on Spotify

4.9.17  10:38 pm   Will the video be out before the end of the world?

     oh hell yeah

4.9.17  10:36 pm   do you like birds?

     they are ok

4.9.17  10:36 pm   any thoughts on war?

     i don't think about war very much
4.9.17  10:23 pm   Are we talking to a persona or is this how you really always are?
4.9.17  9:23 pm   When are you coming back...

4.9.17  9:17 pm   do you think the editing process we learn in american schools is useful to real life? i.e. outline, rough draft, revise a lot, final draft

     the only way to really learn what works for you is to start doing projects and see how it goes

4.9.17  9:05 pm   What's the best breed of dog

     i have not ranked them

4.9.17  9:04 pm   whoops did i press ask

     i think so
4.9.17  8:29 pm   What made you create things?
4.9.17  8:13 pm   are you still a piece of garbage bc if u are ur a good piece of garbage

4.9.17  8:07 pm   should i be asking you less questions?

     i don't know

4.9.17  7:34 pm   is there any way you can explain the key changes in this song (except the obvious first one at 0:12)? it sounds like there is no key change from the chorus to the verse at 1:30-1:40 (same as 0:12-0:22) but i know something weird must be going on here because of the super surprising key change at 2:23, putting it back in the same key it was at 0:12

     in what song

4.9.17  7:25 pm   do you have friends?

     sort of

     if not, do you want them?

     right now i'm in the middle of something

4.9.17  7:19 pm   How do you deal with the loss of someone you love?

     start a new journey

4.9.17  6:58 pm   Is my internet working?

     i think so

4.9.17  6:38 pm   if you never went to youtube and just posted everything on your own website forever would you have ever made history of japan

     ? of course. why wouldn't i
4.9.17  6:20 pm   Do you like memes?

4.9.17  5:57 pm   Is the video coming out before Easter? Please don't use the word plausible.

     i'm not sure when easter is, i actually thought it was today

4.9.17  5:53 pm   hi! what inspired you to make alphabet shuffle?

     common sense, i guess

4.9.17  5:30 pm   how do I get started with building a world

     you have to decide for yourself or else it probably won't be fun

4.9.17  5:24 pm   How does http://www.billwurtz.com/history-of-the-world.mp4 have 4/7 of the letters in HOTEWIG but only take 1/100 the time?

     becauae the length of a video is not determined by the title

4.9.17  5:09 pm   I think I just asked you a question

     you may be right

4.9.17  5:07 pm   What stage are you currently at with the video?

     loose ends, mixing, final jingle vocals, additional labels, etc

4.9.17  5:03 pm   i want to achieve world peace where do i start

     in your mind
4.9.17  4:51 pm   happy birthday bill!

4.9.17  4:47 pm   can i be your camera guy?

     sure
4.9.17  3:35 pm   u ded ?

4.9.17  3:19 pm   What is your favorite quadrilateral?

     square
4.9.17  2:33 pm   what do you think of pineapple on pizza?

4.9.17  2:14 pm   what stage are you on with the video?

     loose ends, mixing, final jingle vocals, additional labels, etc

4.9.17  1:42 pm   do you ever hesitate to stay up late to work on projects bc the lack of sleep at that point might affect the quality of the project

     no, the main reason i would hesitate to stay awake is if i'm tired

4.9.17  1:28 pm   What got you into making the short, funny jingles that you make?

     doing short videos/music is a good way to get started, especially if you are feeling overwhelmed by all the possibilities

4.9.17  1:06 pm   help i forgot how to ask a question

      you're doing great

4.9.17  1:00 pm   why is rain made out of water?

     why would it not be
4.9.17  12:36 pm   why have you stopped making videos?

4.9.17  12:06 pm   What makes us different from the other animals? I mean intrinsically.

     well, we learned how to talk, and use fire, and then we almost immediately learned how to learn more things, including how to build machines, and teach the machines how to build machines. and if you think that's crazy, i think the machines might learn how to learn

4.9.17  11:02 am   As a follow up to my question about song length, will you ever make a long song?

     i would prefer to do many songs in the 3min to 3:30 range, as well as many songs in the 1-3 minute range. and also some in the 15-60sec range
4.9.17  10:54 am   Why are you so random?

4.9.17  10:20 am   is it possible to read every single question here without dying of boredom

     you wanna try and see

4.9.17  10:18 am   Are you doing the mix now or are you past that stage by now?

     i am about to move on to mixing

4.9.17  10:01 am   Have you ever turned the tables (metaphorically speaking)?

     oh hell yeah
